title: Fight, Dia-san!
detail_text: <:th_ch0104/>I haven’t really touched them before, but video games are interesting, aren’t they<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0209/>That’s good to hear. I’m happy…. that you’ve taken a liking to them. Rina-chan’s board「Smile」<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0104/>I thought it was just a normal racing game, but the fact that the use of items can be a bigger deciding factor than driving technique is…. fascinating…. Take that!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0209/>That won’t hit me~. Rina-chan’s board「Smug」<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0104/>That was so close! I’ll get you next time….!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0209/>Hey, Dia-san. I’m glad you’re having fun, but isn’t that posture tiring?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0104/>Eh?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0209/>I think…. It’s more relaxing to sit straight up and face the screen. Also, you don’t have to lean your whole body…. on curves, Dia-san<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0104/>Eh? I’m normally like this though?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0209/>….I see…. That’s your normal, huh. Then…. it’s fine. Let’s have lots of fun, Dia-san<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
